summary: The diff indicates the No-button evasion logic in `frontend/index.html` was updated to clamp positioning within viewport bounds with safe padding and to unify desktop/mobile interaction handling, aiming to ensure 7 evasions before revealing the Yes button. However, the diff also includes an unrelated change to `frontend/src/App.tsx` (redirect behavior) which was not requested and may violate the constraint to implement within the existing single-page `frontend/index.html`.

hallucinated_features.description: React `App.tsx` redirect logic to the standalone HTML page while preserving query parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest scope/constraints specify implementing the fix within the existing single-page implementation in `frontend/index.html` and list no requirements related to React routing/redirects.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state/metadata summary updated to describe broader site capabilities (admin panel, persistence, shareable links, music, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly focused on fixing No-button evasion; modifying project metadata is not requested and is outside the stated non-goals (new unrelated features).
